duties_responsibilities.duty: Analyze information security requirements and apply analytical and systematic approaches to resolve workflow, organization, and planning problems.
Provide security engineering support for planning, design, development, and testing of information systems.
Assist with proposal development as necessary and perform other assigned duties.

education_certification.credential: HS diploma or equivalent required. College degree preferred. Must have at least one DOD 8570.01 IAT level III certification. Must have a relevant certification meeting DOD 8570.01 CND-IS. Computing Environment: Innerview Administrator.
